basic.description:
{Elementary Necromancy}

Elementary Necromancy enables heroes to turn 5% of the creatures that die in battle into Skeleton Warriors.

advanced.description:
{Intermediate Necromancy}

Intermediate Necromancy allows heroes to turn 10% of the creatures that die in battle into skeleton soldiers.

expert.description:
{Advanced Necromancy}

Advanced Necromancy enables heroes to turn 15% of the creatures that die in battle into skeleton soldiers.

basic.description:
{Elementary Diplomacy}

Elementary Diplomacy can reduce the surrender cost by 20% for you.

advanced.description:
{Intermediate Diplomacy}

Intermediate Diplomacy allows you to persuade weaker monsters to join your camp, and also reduces the surrender cost by 35%.

expert.description:
{Advanced Diplomacy}

Advanced Diplomacy enables you to persuade weaker monsters to join your camp, and also reduces the surrender cost by 50%.
